table.title: Number of drivers from each host

search.query: eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32drivers-modulelist $wild$ host=$host$ ModuleItem.ModulePath=$path$ ModuleItem.ModuleName=$name$ | top limit=10 host | eval percent = round(percent,2) | rename host AS Host, count AS Count, percent AS Percent

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32drivers-modulelist $wild$ host=$host$ ModuleItem.ModulePath=$path$ ModuleItem.ModuleName=$name$ | table ModuleItem.ModuleName, ModuleItem.ModuleSize | sort by - ModuleItem.ModuleSize | rename ModuleItem.ModuleName AS Name, ModuleItem.ModuleSize AS Size | dedup Name,Size

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32drivers-modulelist $wild$ host=$host$ ModuleItem.ModulePath=$path$ ModuleItem.ModuleName=$name$ | table ModuleItem.ModuleName, ModuleItem.ModuleSize | sort by ModuleItem.ModuleSize | rename ModuleItem.ModuleName AS Name, ModuleItem.ModuleSize AS Size | dedup Name,Size

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32drivers-modulelist $wild$ host=$host$ ModuleItem.ModulePath=$path$ ModuleItem.ModuleName=$name$ | rare limit=10 ModuleItem.ModuleName | eval percent = round(percent,2) | rename ModuleItem.ModuleName AS Name, count AS Count, percent AS Percent

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32drivers-modulelist $wild$ host=$host$ ModuleItem.ModulePath=$path$ ModuleItem.ModuleName=$name$ | rare limit=10 ModuleItem.ModulePath | eval percent = round(percent,2) | rename ModuleItem_ModulePath AS Path, count AS Count, percent AS Percent

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32drivers-modulelist $wild$ host=$host$ ModuleItem.ModulePath=$path$ ModuleItem.ModuleName=$name$ | eval InitHex=tostring('ModuleItem.ModuleInit', "hex") | eval BaseHex=tostring('ModuleItem.ModuleBase', "hex") | eval AddressHex=tostring('ModuleItem.ModuleAddress', "hex") |table host, ModuleItem.ModulePath, ModuleItem.ModuleName, ModuleItem.ModuleSize, InitHex, BaseHex, AddressHex | rename host AS Host, ModuleItem.ModulePath AS "Full Path", ModuleItem.ModuleName AS Name, ModuleItem.ModuleSize AS Size, InitHex AS "Module Init", BaseHex AS "Module Base", AddressHex as Address
